item.title: Why can't I see any posts?
item.description: Please see http://aecepoglu.com/en/about . The about page describes why this blog exists, what I write about, and what you can expect to show up here in the future. I primarily post here in Turkish. The tr button in the navigation menu should take you there or you can click here: http://aecepoglu.com/ Iâ€™ll start putting up some english-only content and translate some of my posts from Turkish soon enough. You can subscribe to my rss-feed to be notified when that happens.
